pullRequest.title: Backend JWT token generation support within microgateway (updated)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Provides the capability of generating backend JWT tokens within microgateway with the ability to customize the population of claims and the generation of tokens.
Issues
Fixes #1196
Automation tests

Unit tests added: No
Integration tests added: Yes

Tested environments
Ubuntu 20.04 LTS

commit.message: method documentation added for jwt_auth_handler file
configurations updated, generator class creation moved to initiation, mapvalue to map java side
seperate bal file added for interop functions
error handling moved to ballerina side
restricted claims array conversion moved to java side
added multiple audience option, refactored code, added license

nodes.bodyText: I think we can put the common strings used here in a constant file and use those constants instead. If they are already defined as constants let's use that. Ex: "customClaims", "sub", "iss", "tier" etc.
